titleStmt.title: A moderate reply to the citie-remonstrance; presented to the High Court of Parliament the 26 of May, 1646. Containing severall reasons why many well affected citizens cannot assent thereunto. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Price, John, Citizen of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Matthew Simmons, and Henry Overton in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Price by Wing.
A reply to the Corporation of London, Court of Common Councell's remonstrances and petitions to the Lords and Commons (Wing T1447 and T1666).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
